title: New: abhi//dijon – Let You Know
body:
Still getting serious Confessions era Usher vibes from [abhi//dijon](https://soundcloud.

com/abhidijon), in the best way possible of course. New track _Let You Know_ is yet another slice of super chilled out R&B, further proving their capabilities as hit-makers. Check out Let You Know below.
